JobFullDesc: The GPS (Global Product & SWE) recruiting function at Facebook supports technical hiring across all of our consumer apps and products within the Facebook company (Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, WhatsApp, Workplace, Portal, Oculus & Novi) as well as our Ads, Growth, Responsible Innovation, Privacy and Emerging Product teams. As we hire some of the best technical minds around, we need the best recruiting minds to match our business needs. As a Recruiting Manager for the Product Design team, you will oversee Product Design hiring across Facebook, Instagram, Ads, Growth and Novi. You will apply your operational depth and strategic thinking to develop, drive, and execute on the staffing strategies across the Design organization. A critical component of success in this role will be the ability to iterate on existing recruiting processes to ensure their scalability while closely partnering with global partners to ensure efficiency and global alignment, while maintaining a core focus on inclusive hiring.This Recruiting Manager will also lead staffing professional leaders who manage teams that  execute against global hiring targets and work closely with multiple stakeholders to drive world class recruiting practices with a constant eye on scaling for the future. In this role, you will know how to manage, mentor, and guide a team of managers, recruiters and/or sourcers through all facets of the recruiting life-cycle.Inspire, grow and nurture a team of
